com.dropbox.core.v1

Class DbxThumbnailFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dropbox.core.v1.DbxThumbnailFormat

  • public class DbxThumbnailFormat
extends java.lang.Object
    Thumbnail image format presets, to be used with DbxClientV1.getThumbnail(com.dropbox.core.v1.DbxThumbnailSize, com.dropbox.core.v1.DbxThumbnailFormat, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.io.OutputStream).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.lang.String ident 
      static DbxThumbnailFormat JPEG
      JPEG format, preferred over PNG for photographic images.
      static DbxThumbnailFormat PNG
      PNG format, preferred over JPEG for non-photographic images, such as screenshots and digital art.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DbxThumbnailFormat(java.lang.String ident) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static DbxThumbnailFormat bestForFileName(java.lang.String fileName, DbxThumbnailFormat fallback)
      Try and guess the right DbxThumbnailFormat to use based on the image's file name.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • ident

        public final java.lang.String ident

      • JPEG

        public static final DbxThumbnailFormat JPEG
        JPEG format, preferred over PNG for photographic images.

      • PNG

        public static final DbxThumbnailFormat PNG
        PNG format, preferred over JPEG for non-photographic images, such as screenshots and digital art.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DbxThumbnailFormat

        public DbxThumbnailFormat(java.lang.String ident)

    • Method Detail

      • bestForFileName

        public static DbxThumbnailFormat bestForFileName(java.lang.String fileName,
                                                 DbxThumbnailFormat fallback)
        Try and guess the right DbxThumbnailFormat to use based on the image's file name. Sometimes this function won't be able to guess and will just return whatever you pass in for fallback. 
         DbxThumbnailFormat.bestForFileName("test.png");          // returns DbxThumbnailFormat.PNG
 DbxThumbnailFormat.bestForFileName("/stuff/funny.GIF");  // returns DbxThumbnailFormat.PNG
 DbxThumbnailFormat.bestForFileName("/family.jpg");       // returns DbxThumbnailFormat.JPEG
